document_data.name: Fives Council
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Fives Council''' served as the ruling body of government of [[Yhaunn]] in [[1358 DR]].

This organization derived its name because each table of a council session seated five people.
document_data.Activities: Aside from dealing with current events topics, the Fives Council was responsible for electing the [[Nessarch]], or mayor.
document_data.Organization: Composed of wealthy property owners and merchants, the Fives Council was open to those who arrived early to claim the 75 seats. Seated individuals were permitted to vote on current topics.
